website_summaries.verdict: We love this drill set for the large number of accessories and tools suited for most users' needs. Despite some durability concerns, it's an unbeatable deal.
pros: A huge set that's ideal for countless projects
Includes 20-volt drill/driver with lithium ion battery, 68 hand tools and accessories including bits and carrying bag
cons: Not contractor-quality – drill doesn't deliver as much torque as some competitors, and some of the tools aren't as sturdy as expensive models

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the set I started to take everything out of the tray and put it in the bag that came with it... But then I remembered all the reviews saying that they didn't like having the sharp pieces floating freely in the bag. So instead of using the bag that came with it I decided to cut off the top of the box it came in and just store the kit, with the clear molded plastic that came on it, on a shelf, like pictured. We find it really handy to be able to see everything at once and for everything to have a place.
customer_reviews.author: Malyli

customer_reviews.title: Step down from the hard case set.
customer_reviews.text: Prefer the old set with a hard case and better hammer. This set is just ok. The carrying bag isn't good for the drill bits or smaller components and the hammer is less than good quality, starting with the cheap and thin handle that's harder to grip. The tools inlcuded, in general, are much cheaper and lower quality. They all say "China" on them, which is typical, but the old set was far better quality. The only upside to this set is that it's a 20v, rather than a standard drill with a plug in charger and no removable battery.
customer_reviews.author: thempteacher

customer_reviews.title: totally useless. Multiple contractors have had a go at trying ...
customer_reviews.text: Drill arrived with frozen chuck making this drill completely, utterly, totally useless. Multiple contractors have had a go at trying to get it to work. Black and Decker customer service was unhelpful. Do not buy this item. It's not reliable and the Black and Decker warranty is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mudgett

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner and home use tool kit. Not the best price for its quality.
customer_reviews.text: The power drill, screwdriver, and all the attachments are of high quality. However, the metal construction on the tools should have better quality. The metals look cheap and unsmooth. For the price of almost 80 dollars when it's on sale, I still think that this is a bit overpriced. Also, the storage bag rips easily if you put all your tools in it which that's what you're supposed to do. I would recommend adding extra storage layers to protect the bag from sharp tools. As I said if this is your very first home tool kit go for it. If you already own other major power drill brands then look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser275

customer_reviews.title: Really good for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set for about two or three months now. It is really a good deal for what you paid for and for what all you get in the package. My only complaint is that the hammer seems to be rather cheaply made and will help hammerin my only complaint is that the hammer seems to be rather cheaply made and while hammering some tiny nails on to my mailbox to hold the numbers up for my address, it started denting the hammer. One other complaint I have about this is when I received my set everything seem to be covered in some sort of oil. I'm not sure if that's standard but that's the way mine was.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after just 4 times!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used just 4 times the cordless drill and suddenly it doesnt work anymore! when pushing the bottom the lights turn on, but it doesnt move. I am Very disappointed. Very frustrating the moment you want to do your project and you can't rely on a brand new product. And believe me the battery is supposed to be charged! UPDATE review: i have contacted Amazon customer support and i have to say that Amazon customer service has been amazing trying to help me get this solved with the product and the warranty I am glad Amazon is not leaving their customers on their own. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my vacation home, so I don't have to haul my tools back and forth. The measuring tape broke on a second use. The included bag does not have any pockets or compartment, so when you try to retrieve a screwdriver from the bottom you are bound to cut your fingers on the exposed flat drill bits. Would not recommend for anything other than secondary location, probably will not survive anything but occasional use
customer_reviews.author: nbdoc02067

customer_reviews.title: Great drill and casing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and the casing to keep things in order and organized is wonderful. Not to heavy and easy to use. Portability is great. Was using my husbands and his was quite heavy. I waited to give this item a review until I was able to use it personally for awhile. Holds a great charge and I use it all the time. I would buy this again for my daughters. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: When you put the drill in reverse to remove screws, it automatically loosens the bit you have in place. There's no "lock" to secure the bit once you tighten it, so that's annoying. There are several really sharp pieces in this kit, yet the kit doesn't come with a permanent hard cover for any of the sharp attachments. I had to find alternative storage containers for the sharp pieces and put them in the bag to keep the set together. The battery life is good. The drill works well other than the bits falling out during use. Again... annoying.
customer_reviews.author: ATB7518

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits brake. Go for a better name brand.
customer_reviews.text: I used the item just to remove some rivets off my tools box. The drill bits just continued to brake every time I tried to drill the rivet out. The drill bits that are included with it are worthless since I broke 3 just trying to drill out that rivet.
customer_reviews.author: edwini18

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FALL FOR THIS "BARGAIN"!!
customer_reviews.text: Drill has performed nicely. Hasn't been tested/challenged yet. All those extras are cheap garbage. I passed up a de Walt for the same price but needed some of those extras so i chose this garbage. The drill bits, extentions etc arent even magnetized in 2020!!!! Makes your job twice as difficult and irritating and takes you twice as long when you are constantly digging around for fallen bits, screws and extensions!!!! MADDENING!!!!! Buy a REAL DRILL and buy quality extras. Don't fall for this bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Drexl Spivey

customer_reviews.title: ... this as my DIY tool kit and was SOOO super excited when I got it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my DIY tool kit and was SOOO super excited when I got it! Love all the tools and attachments it comes with. However, I am very disappointed with the tool bag. I would give this 5 stars if the bag offered some kind of organization for all the pieces ie: pockets/compartments instead of just dumping all of it in the bag. Also, the phillips head and flat head drivers are very big and will not fit most small screw heads. Overall, a great purchase and value. I LOVE THE DRILL which is the reason I bought this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: ReislingGal

customer_reviews.title: Great value on a super useful set for simple DIY work
customer_reviews.text: Right sized, useful, and super practical little kit for a first time drill purchase. The accessories are well considered and it seems like a lot of thought was put into providing what simple around the house and weekend projects will require. The drill charges pretty fast and has good power as long as you’re not drilling through concrete or building an ark. The accessories are well considered and geared towards casual tasks vs. specialized application. That being said, they all include some features that typically mark more high end tools. Overall, an excellent set for a great price, just make sure to keep it limited to weekend projects and simple house projects.
customer_reviews.author: KRGB

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to use this for anything other than light weight jobs that don't require any power, then this is not the tool. The screw drivers are really big, they can't fit in any small screws. I am however getting use out of the other tools other than the drill and screw drivers. I would suggest, investing in a better drill, this will not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery good, drill mediocre...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my previous drill had a ferrous oxide battery that would not hold a charge. I wanted something (for occasional use) that had a lithium ion battery. This filled that requirement, but the drill itself doesn't have sufficient flexibility to be as useful as previous drills I've owned. If I were doing it again, I'd spring for a more capable drill (while staying with the improved battery technology).
customer_reviews.author: J. Bevan

customer_reviews.title: For the not so handy person.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good purchase for how much if given in one set. I am not a handy person but this tool set has immediately helped me fix a lot of things in my home. It comes with one bag that fits everything inside but no compartment. No star reduce for the no inside compartment part because it’s clear in the description. I just use random container to separate the tools. The tools are brand new and sharp so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: This was a great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set for the price, and it came with all the tools and accessories that I needed for basic projects around the house (putting together furniture, drilling holes in the wall, hammering nails). I was on the fence about buying this product because I am normally willing to pay more for a higher quality product with a longer lifespan, but all the great reviews convinced me to bite the bullet. The case is sturdy, compact, holds its shape, and stores all of the tools and accessories that come in the set. It packs away nicely in my closet, which is a huge bonus. For the price and quality, I thought this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but could include more.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a pretty good drill set. The photos make it looks like it comes with a case. However, it's just a flimsy bag. Kind of like a thicker tote bag. There's no organization with this. You just throw everything in there. I had to buy a toolbox to hold all the stuff. Other than that it's pretty good. Worked well for hanging pictures, dart board mount and drilling drainage holes.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool Kit for home!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with two batteries and a charger and they last long, it could be that I use the drill casually, to hang pictures and do other misc. Work around the house nothing too demanding, I bought it back in December and I have only charged the batteries, 3 times in all this time, the other cools are good, and the bag to put everything inside it's a nice addition. Overall a good kit to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Lack of tools hard case is a huge minus
customer_reviews.text: The set is great but a huge minus is a lack of a sturdy hard case to have all tools in one place and organised. The tiny bag that comes with the tools is a joke. Only because of this I am returning the set. Something to consider for manufacturer that will be appreciated by consumers, especially first home-owners. If a hard case for this exact set is sold separately and is affordable, I might keep the tools. Please let me know. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a starter set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a starter set of tools. I had a much smaller set without a drill about 10 years ago, but several moves and roommates had reduced it down to a pair of pliers, a hammer and a flat head screw driver. This has been perfect since moving into my new place. The drill works fine for my needs (drilling screws into drywall, assembling ikea furniture). The carrying bag is nice, I like that it has some extra room for my other tools and some future tools. Price was also great for everything you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: The driver takes a charge quickly and lasts for days of heavy household use (installing towel bars, etc.). I'm very impressed. Normally I'm a tool snob and insist on better brands, but this little unit fights above its weight. The drill bits and paddle bits are brilliant additions as are the full-sized screwdrivers. The weakest component is the hammer only because it's cheap plastic grip makes your hand smell funny after you use it. But for cheap, this is a GREAT starter set.
customer_reviews.author: iJeep2

customer_reviews.title: Wow, the value is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is seriously worth every penny! Having a new tool kit was something I always wanted, but I figured I'd either have to spend a lot of money for a big bundle, or collect some quality pieces over time... That was until I found this! For less than 100 bucks, you'd think this kit was cheap garbage, but everything in it is easy to use and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Useful for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am a new beginner at home projects. This kit works for me. The most useful tool for me is the power drill or whatever you call it. Its great for assembling , disassembling chairs and furniture. It also works with Allen Wrenches for those awful IKEA kind of furniture assembly projects. The one drawback is that the manual was kind of useless to me. Better to send some video links or an USB drive explaining how it is done with the package.
customer_reviews.author: hilloo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was buying my first house and figured I'd need a drill before the move. Best purchase I've ever made. I use it all the time. Battery lasts FOREVER (got the drill 4 months ago and even after daily use, have not run out of battery) and I have not run into a project that this set of tools didn't have everything I needed to finish. Carrying case fits everything well and is easy to move around as a set. I'd recommend it to anybody looking for a kit for minor home repairs/projects.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool kit with the most often used tools gathered in a light little bag.
customer_reviews.text: My previous tool kit was a large box that never moved from the garage because it was too heavy to move. The large tool box accumulated a lot of useless tools and junk that made finding what I needed more difficult. This home tool kit is just the right size and weight to be useful and there is no temptation to overfill the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: All in one tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set for my daughter’s move to an apartment. Tools appear to be good quality and good grips for smaller hands. Drill is lightweight and does light jobs. My only real issue with this kit is the carrying bag which is cheaply made and does not include any compartments to keep drill bits, blades and sockets from jumbling together in a tangled mess. Good luck not slicing your hand looking for the pliers.
customer_reviews.author: N Watson

customer_reviews.title: everything feels cheap like it would easily break
customer_reviews.text: The most common phillips head screwdriver you'll ever use is a number two, this came with a number three which is way too big for most screws! It does have the multibit screwdriver that has number twos in it, but you literally have to use a pair of pliers to pull out the bit to put in the driver for use. Also everything is very very very poorly made, everything feels cheap like it would easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Allen

customer_reviews.title: A decent household tool kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit offers all the basic tools we need around the house. The only problem is that the carrying bag is not big enough to store all tools and keep them organized. We only keep the power drill, battery pack, and charger in the bag and store all the tools in a utility box. We also bought a small plastic case to keep all the sharp items (e.g., drilling bits, hole saws, etc.) in place for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy JST

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: One of the first things I noticed is this drill is fairly weak, but it got the job done. So far I’ve used this to drill a couple holes and install some screws in 3/4” MDF and it really struggled. Can’t complain too much though for the price and all the included extras. Good for light jobs and someone who will only need a drill on the odd occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got a bargain buying this used but soooo well worth it!! It was only missing a tool that was supposed to be included in the bundle.. but amazon customer service is always TOP notch and 100% willing to help their loyal customers! Love this tool set!!!! It is now my Go To for all my DIY projects and it is absolutely spectacular!! Life changer!! I highly recommend for all DIY people and handy people that like to fix and build projects.. happy shopping!!
customer_reviews.author: Taina Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Toy-grade hand tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my step-daughter who lives far from here. I saw the kit a few months later and was a bit embarrassed about the hand tools - they are tiny, flimsy, low quality, almost like something you'd give a small child as toys. The drill is mediocre. I can't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Shrek Ogre

customer_reviews.title: Surprising reliable
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my closet for over a year and never used any of these tools. I had a project come up recently that I needed to drill holes in metal. Well this kit had everything I needed to get the job done. The power drill was good enough to drill the hole through metal. Not sure about steel but it works fine on aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Cable

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, spend a little more money on a better quality kit or buy individual tools for your needs
customer_reviews.text: The drill is fine for basic use, but all three of the smaller drill bits have broken on me. The measuring tape is the worst measuring tape I've ever used, absolute garbage. The philips head screwdriver that came with has fit exactly zero screws I’ve tried it on so far. The bag has no organization....save yourself some regret and go ahead and buy a better brand and just get the tools that you need. Some of the things in this kit I don't ever see myself needing or using.
customer_reviews.author: videostudent11

customer_reviews.title: A Woman’s Go to Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drill tool kit for myself, fed up with my husbands drill always being without a charge and seems like he could never find his 🔌 charger when I needed something hung, or needing a new curtain rod hung. Problem solved, now he or anyone else are allowed to borrow my drill and tool kit. The drill is well constructed and not too heavy for maneuvering, and the extra tools 🛠 that came with the kit was an added plus. I recommend every woman to purchase this kit and hide it from their husbands.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline F. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful assortment of basic tools as a bonus when all ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW, WOW, WOW!!! What a wonderful assortment of basic tools as a bonus when all I really needed was to add the FABULOUS Black & Decker Lithium drill to my growing collection of other B&D Lithium tools. I LOVE the B&D batteries--they hold their charge, charge quickly, and don't tend to die on the third use like the other assorted tool batteries do. The drill itself is light duty, but that's all I'm asking of it. Thanks Black & Decker!! And special thanks to Amazon for this delightful assortment at a particularly reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: CaroChel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because church tools have gone missing. The drill is a bit weaker as other reviews says. However, you can get things done with this tool kit. I am not a very handy man but it seems like this drill quickly loses power so make sure to charge it for full power. Overall, a great deal for the price. Update: The drill works well. It successfully built desks :D Update 2: Drill is good, we build more desks and we unscrewed a door to move a fridge in and then screwed the door back in
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cool Set But Came Open-Box Not New
customer_reviews.text: Cool set for the price. The tools seem to be decent quality and its everything an average person would need to do anything around the house. My only issue is that the set came open-box when I purchase new. The packaging seal had been broken on the box and someone repackaged the tools. The instructions manual is all folded and there's a loose bag in the set. Doesn't seem like I'm missing anything and not worth the hassle of return. Contacted Amazon support and was able to get a small refund similar to the "Used" price. So i'll just live with it. If there are any issues, will return. May come back to update review if the tools are good.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wong

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Product and the extra tools are an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: This is the best drill. Lightweight, durable, and long lasting. I bought one for my fiancé who owns a home repair business and it has lasted longer than high dollar drills he had purchased for himself in the past. So, I had to buy one for myself to replace my older version of the Black and Decker. I am not disappointed with the extra tools included with this kit. I am a homeowner and this kit is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: dk1gray

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The drill isn't super torque-y, I wouldn't recommend trying to use this on anything thick but for a basic set it has alot of value. Really worth the money, would just upgrade to a better drill for bigger jobs. Wish they added $20 to the price and made the drill have a higher torque setting instead of just speed
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year, everything holding strong except screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago and have used it for a variety of projects around my apartment. It's very useful and covers basically all my needs. The only reason I take off a star is because I experienced the same problem as other people - the ball bearing fell off the screwdriver at some point and it can no longer hold the bits which makes that tool sadly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This has EVERYTHING. I was afraid it was not good enough because of the price, but everything is very decent. The drill would work for a very long time with charge!! Everything is great strong and light. They could improve the carrying bag though, cause you have to throw everything mixed in there.
customer_reviews.author: Felix A Taveras

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill and basic tool set!
customer_reviews.text: The drill is great, and it came very nicely packaged! I have used the drill, as well as several of the tools and accessories, a few times. I gave the product only 4 stars because, a very flimsy pouch with a zipper was provided for storage of all the accessories, which will make it a hassle finding the item you are looking for. I will be purchasing a small tool box eventually, but, right now, I am storing all the accessories in the original packaging, because everything is displayed and organized where you can easily locate what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great household drill and toolkit.
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and just need an effective little drill for getting day to day stuff done around the house this is your guy. The Phillips head screw driver is horrific however, but after a three dollar gas station replacement it is a great little kit to have in the house. Much cheaper than most drills like this but holds up just fine. Would definitely recommend for household use. Not so much for construction.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Affordable all purpose tool kit that will last your lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a case and high quality drill bits and screwdriver heads. It is amazing for a college student like me who moved out for the first time. I do wish they included hex keys but that's okay. So far I used this tool kit to assemble 5 products from IKEA and will expect to put it to good use even more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when i was moving out of my parents house - who all have a million tools. This came with all the essentials - and even some items that i will likely never use. The electric drill isn't too big, and fairly light-weight so its easy to use. It also has a flashlight at the top of it, so you can always see what you're doing. VERY HELPFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for quite a while. I am a 50 year old woman, and this screw gun has no power. Half the time I have to remove the screws by hand because the driver doesn't have the power to do it. I can't even put screws in to a stud. Pretty much useless. Will need another one to do the jobs I need to do. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: pat845

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE DRILL
customer_reviews.text: Well I gotta say this little drill is pretty powerful and lightweight, also the rest of the tools that come with it seem pretty good quality, nice assortment of drill bits and screw driver bits as well, Not bad for $80 bucks, already use it to install a door knob.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used it yet my first impression is that the bag is not very useful, I have no ideas where to put those ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first tool set since DIY is not really my thing, but I bought a condo recently, it needs some fix-ups, so getting this would be handy even I have no idea how to use some of them. Haven’t used it yet my first impression is that the bag is not very useful, I have no ideas where to put those sharp saw/screws, it can hurt your fingers or get lost in betweens. So I will go find a tool box of some kind. For that money I hope the company can provide a better bag!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No bag but works
customer_reviews.text: So mine didn't come with a bag, which was upsetting, but it doesn't stop the tools from functioning. Great tool set, the drill isn't as strong as I wished, on max setting it barley can punction tough wood, but it still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Update - Black and Decker, although nearly impossible to contact, sent me a replacement just prior to the 2 yr warranty expiring, because the drill bit seized up. Original review - This is exactly what I needed moving into a house. I had a lot of mis-matched random tools, so this kit really brought it all together. The drill is outstanding for hanging blinds, and pictures. Everything is good quality, and the tool bag is thick. This is a great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: carolina.country

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting powerful and compact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this September of 2015 I still have the drill and original battery AND BOTH STILL WORK PERFECTLY. Honestly could not have asked for a better product. So this is my 5 year review of this product 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: For light duty use only.
customer_reviews.text: Little power, not enough torque to use in big projects, Battery is great, holds the charge and last long time. I would recommend for removing small screw or drilling thin materials. I won’t recommend for construction job or any heavy duty application ".
customer_reviews.author: carlos diaz

customer_reviews.title: Owner of this set for more than 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Now, I barely use it, so take that into consideration that you'll need a better, expensive set for heavy use, but for small things around the house or furniture, this is perfect. The blade doesn't work, which is a disappointment because is the most used item but the rest, especially that wonderful drill, is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Great drill, great package
customer_reviews.text: This was almost an impulse buy. We were still making do with the corded drill we bought circa 1975. (!) We'd been talking about buying a cordless drill for a long time, and although we already had most of the tools that come with this drill we decided to go for it. The drill works perfectly and holds a charge for a long time. It's nicely balanced despite the big bulge of the battery. Yay, Kinja Deals! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marte

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I use it for work works great has a lot of parts that come with it I didn't have to go out and buy other tools or parts to tools since it has a good variety of things that came with it also comes with a sack that you can put your tools in so that's great too
customer_reviews.author: Ms Black

customer_reviews.title: Love this starter set
customer_reviews.text: Love this starter set. FYI: NOT ALL GIRLS LIKE PINK! It has just a little bit of everything you need to do anything around the house. (And my male roommate can't fix anything around the house except the cars.) In fact I built a set at my community theatre with this set and an additional circular saw too. I also love that this thing holds a charge for a really long time too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this little toolkit
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this little toolkit! It has all the essential items you'd need to do most small projects around the house. I recently used it to install a TV mount in my apartment, and it came in super handy. My only gripe so far is that the ratcheting screwdriver that came with this kit immediately broke and will no longer hold the bits on the end.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Downs

customer_reviews.title: How Did I Live Life Without This?
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drill set. I ordered it for a move because I was tired of asking friends if I could borrow theirs. This is absolutely the best bang for your buck. I used it to disassemble and assemble a bunch of things and it was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: MsJoy

customer_reviews.title: Tool box set
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice set, but not really like the Quality, only been using it for couple times, to put fans up for my new house, the screw keep falling off the drill after I put up first fan, it’s cant really suck on it, I don’t know how to describe it, Magnetic doesn’t really work. That’s really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Mehgan Eaker

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely glad I purchased this prior to moving to another state. I find myself needing something in this tool kit almost daily, especially when putting new furniture together vs using the given carpal tunnel causing tools usually included with new furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This set isn’t very sturdy. I attempted to drill a new hole into my wooden shelf to re-place a screw and the drill bit broke. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good - Chuck hard to tighten
customer_reviews.text: Light and powerful. Have not used it for the full life of the battery so cannot say how well the battery will last. However, really been battling to tighten the chuck no the drill bit. Keeps slipping when drilling through things like Aluminum.... problem that I have not had with any of my previous drills.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kwon Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Only for lite DIY
customer_reviews.text: If you just need something around the house to hang pictures and occasionally blinds, this is your gal. If you're a blossoming DIY-er, spring for the more powerful heavy-duty cordless drill from a competitor. This just does not give you enough power and stability for building and renovations.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Just moved, this was my best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and haven't owned my own tools. This kit was very affordable, arrived very quickly, and has so many things I needed. I had my own small level from a TV mount purchase, so that's one of the things I would look for outside of this kit. This drill works great, battery lasts very long, and makes being in a new place so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many duplicate parts- only about 6 screw driver heads- rest are duplicates
customer_reviews.text: Not as described- several duplicate screw heads e.g 4 size 1 Philips, 4 size 2 Phillips and so on, Therefore out of 36 screw driver heads you really only get 6 and numerous duplicates of the heads. They should give you a listing of every item included in this set since have no way of knowing if the duplicates are normal or no. There should be no reason for 4 of the same size screw driver head!
customer_reviews.author: sunmoon

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not very useful
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt drill a small pvc tube with this so if you need for anything other than screwing things into soft surfaces this is fairly useless. I charged the battery and everything was setup right. I borrowed my friends Ryobi and drilled a hole with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Saba C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool kit but would be nice to add hexagonal screws
customer_reviews.text: Having it for a few months and could say that this is quite good tool kit for small jobs. Drill is powerful enough to make wholes in bricks and I still did not have to charge it once after buying (and I'm using it quite a lot). There are lots of extensions for any kind of job, but for some reason there are no hexagonal screws which would be nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but they do the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I moved into my apartement in New York. I wanted to hang some things on the wall and put together some furniture. All the tools included in the box function properly. The only problem I see is that they are not such high quiality tools. None have broken yet (5 months) but you can still tell they are low quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Great Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for home use!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! Great set and works great. Has all the basic pieces I need for around the house. Only issue I found is it’s hard to change the torque level on driver. I spent several days comparing products, and I’m so happy I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: California Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter when she moved out of the area and couldn't easily borrow my tools. The set is pretty basic and I had to augment it with some allen wrenches and additional bits, but it's done the trick and works well to do around-the-apartment jobs. The tools are of fair to good quality and look like they'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Toyman

customer_reviews.title: A great starter bag
customer_reviews.text: As a lady, new to tools, this bag truly has most things that you need to hang shelves, pictures, cut wood, basic tasks that you can't really mess up. The only thing is I wish I had a level and a stud finder. You'll probably need a few smaller bags or containers to keep everything organized but it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great home improvment starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit does the job. The basics for getting a simple home improvment project are all included here. The drill is powerful enough for the price, and the quality of it isn’t bad. This is a perfect kit for someone that is just getting started in buying their own tools inventory; definitely recommend for the price. One critique about the kit is the bag - I wish it had pockets to better store the tools and extension pieces rather than stuffing everything without any organization.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Best Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This tool set has everything you need for basic furniture assembly or around the house repairs. The drill is fairly powerful for such a small handheld one, and the drill bits have held up extremely well with fairly regular use. I've used nearly every tool in this st multiple times and they have all worked extremely well. The set was well worth the price and has been extremely useful in repairing small things around the house and in assembling all of the new furniture that I purchased when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Evan957

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: The kit as a whole was great for the price. For someone who is unfamiliar with drills (such as myself) the directions could have been a bit more clear. Allen wrench would have been nice but other than that, this kit is great especially for "the beginner"
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tools, comfortable drill pack
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the case... it was a factor for me, but I found a canvas bag, with no separation/protection for the cutting edges. Everything dumps in the bottom, like granny's purse, or a junk drawer. : (
customer_reviews.author: JSumner

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tool set purchase but seems to have everything basic for your standard home improvement/repairs. My only irk is the cutter; everytime I slide it down, the bottom drops off. Otherwise, I'm glad to have finally bought a full set for my home needs.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Great set and value
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this set. Needed a lightweight drill and this fits the bill. Great quality. Had to order another set of drill bits 'cause I needed a 1/2" bit, but that's ok. Lots of useful items in package.
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great set for small businesses or home use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. It's not a high quality professional equipment, but it is perfect for small business or home use. I'll give it a 5 stars and review it after a few months. I'm very happy with the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got this a month or so ago and parts are already rusting. The bits that go in the screw driver thing just fall out and don’t fit snug. Definitely a cheap set. But for just simple rarely used home use it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Seems sub par for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used several tools but this set doesn't stand up to the advertised capabilities. Many of my tools have gotten stripped while installing new furniture. Other than that it is a good kit to have around the house for very small projects.
customer_reviews.author: ashRD

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I would actually give 3.5 stars if I could. Everything is great with the set for home projects. However, my big problem is that it is near impossible to get the screwdriver heads out of the little contraption they are housed in. I usually end up having to use the pliers to get the screwdriver head out. A holder that spaces the pieces out a little farther would help a lot...or something. But the current design is difficult to use. The drill is great. Like the ratchet style turning mechanism on the screwdriver. Makes it easy to use in tighter or hard(er) to see places.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I've been able to use this tool bag on a job site with full confidence in the drill and battery life. Even the hand tools have served me well. I highly recommend this even for the professional to take on handyman projects. Tidy package to easily carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: RBLFowler

customer_reviews.title: Great set, weak carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Only complaint is that the carrying bag is pretty weak and tore after I put an extra, lighter-weight hammer in there as well - couldn't support a little extra weight I guess. But the set itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for guys!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! Everything I need and more. There have been times when I wished I had a drill that would make "seated" holes and by gosh this kit has it. I did not need another hammer but glad that I now have an upstairs hammer and a downstairs hammer. One can always use needle nose pliers, an extra wrench, a pneumatic screwdriver (WHAT?!? you know you need it!). The only thing I would change is the case itself. If it was a hard case or opened wider or was sectioned, it would be perfect. The way it is made is dangerous. You can cut yourself if you are not careful as there are sharp things in there.
customer_reviews.author: K T-berry

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 'light duty
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 'light duty, around the house, grab and go" needs. Only 4 stars due to the drill bits are not very good, but bought a set of titanium bits on clearance at Lowes to put in the bag and all is well! Like there is enough room in the bag for me to add some of my other commonly needed items used regularly for projects so I don't need to go to the big tool box to get this or that.
customer_reviews.author: hizbaby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Inclusive Set but Cheap Built
customer_reviews.text: The set includes all the necessities that you might need for basic DIY house work. However the thing that irritated be is the cheap build. The bit driver lost it's magnetic properties within 2 months. And after just a few times use one of the drill bit snapped in half with out much exertion. The grip in the drill machine is not that strong either. Not sure if I received a faulty set but I only had this for a year and barely use these. This is not acceptable for a $100 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sifat A.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Decent set but do not plan on using the bag. The pieces have extremely sharp edges and will cut your hand open. There’s also an intense smell from grease that is on multiple pieces. Should be produced w more care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: All in one! Since I got this I've been able to do so many things on my own. I already had a heavy duty corded drill that I loved but it was heavy and sort of hard to use for me ( I'm a woman and I'm not strong at all) so, it worked great for concrete but I was looking for something I could use to make furniture and easy stuff around the house. This one works just perfect. I definitely recommend it, and my husband loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and an even more amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: All the tools that were included in the bag are amazing. The drill is a lot more powerful than I had anticipated and the attachments are nothing to play with. Everything from the screwdrivers to the drill bits do exactly as they are intended. These tools will get the job and more. Of course, these tools aren't going to be as strong as a Ryobi, Makita, or any of those higher tier tools, but I would highly recommend these tools for anyone who is starting out in an apartment or house and need a set of tools to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for a Christmas present. She does carpentry so she was happy, and has built a ton of shelving since then with the drill. I've also used this drill and the accompanying tools. It's a great set, and the drill gets the job done. The included drill bits are well constructed and reliable. I've drilled out two snapped bolts with this drill and a couterclockwise bit (not included with the set), and it had enough torque to get the job done. Battery lasts a long time on a full charge. Excellent purchase for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: stallion

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a drill with a cord
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money spent on this item I recommend people invest the funds into a CORDED drill Seems the lithium battery won't charge.. after being plugged into a wall socket for 2 weeks ..the light on the charger still blinks ted The rest of the bundle is excellent .. I've only had thr problem with the drill battery Would I buy it again ...nope ..nuh huh
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne barry

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of projects around my home and this drill set has been great! I’ve already used several of the attachments and have been happy with each piece of equipment. The battery also has a long life.
customer_reviews.author: M Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I like it that it contains almost everything ever needed (especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool kit to keep in the house because everything tends to shift to the garage. I like it that it contains almost everything ever needed (especially the drill with the charger) for household projects or the smallest "tweaks". Black and decker makes good quality tools and these are no exception. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the bag doesn't have anything to hold the items, especially the small ones. Everything just sits loosely in it making a person to have to sift through the tools to find what they want (or dump the bag out).
customer_reviews.author: Kara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Plus
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product, I bought it as my first set of tools as I was moving into my new home. The carrying bag is so great makes for such easy storage and to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bag
customer_reviews.text: Everything else is perfect, the bad just rip apart I supposed due to the weight . Would have love to see a stronger bag. How do I get a replacement bag for this ?
customer_reviews.author: David Milton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit has begun causing problems after two days of use. The drill is weak and can barely drill into studs at all. The ratcheting screwdriver has begun to fall apart after a SINGLE USE. Two stars because I assume the pliers and drill bits are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Kekel

customer_reviews.title: For the money this kit is awesome!! All the tools are sturdy and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money this kit is awesome!! All the tools are sturdy and don't seem cheap. I've used several already for various projects and none show signs of wear. The battery on the power drill also seems great, haven't had to charge it yet! The variety of tools it comes with, for this price, makes this a great starters tool bag or even a great add on for more experienced users. Only thing that kind of sucks is the bag. It'll hold everything, but it's pretty basic so you just end up throwing it all in there together. Recommend you buy a separate tool box to keep the pieces. Highly recommended kit!
customer_reviews.author: Beyondthedepths

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kit is ok for the price (purchased on sale) - Don't think it would last very long with everyday use, but fine for occasional use - The drill is actually stronger than I expected - Used to install sheetrock, and did fine screwing the drywall screws into the 2x4s.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of home tools
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for an inexpensive drill and came across this set. The tools themselves aren't super high grade but they'll do the job. It's really a really good set to just keep around the house. Same goes for the drill, I had a little trouble using the cookie cutter to drill through wood but it goes through drywall just fine. I was really satisfied with my purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alans Gutierrez

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 20V MAX Drill & Home Tool Kit, 68 Piece (LDX120PK),Black/Orange
product_meta.description: Style:20V Home Tool KitThe BLACK+DECKER LDX120PK 20V Max cordless drill and battery power project Kit is a great power tool set for a variety of home projects. Includes 20V cordless drill, which provides an extra level of control with an 11 position clutch that prevents stripping and overdriving screws. The lithium ion battery is always ready and holds a charge up to 18 months. This battery powered drill kit includes 68 hand tools and accessories and a carrying bag for easy portability and storage. Includes carrying bag for easy portability and storage.
feature_bullets: Includes 20V Lithium drill for a variety of home projects, hanging pictures or wall decor, assembling furniture, updating fixtures, building birdhouses
Lithium ion battery: Always ready, holds a charge up to 18 months
The 11 position clutch prevents stripping and overdriving screws

Included components: (1) LDX120 drill/driver, (1) 20 volt max lithium ion battery, (1) charger, (1) storage bag, (1) tape measure, (1) adjustable wrench, (1) needle nose pliers, (2) manual screwdrivers, (1) utility knife, (1) slip joint pliers, (1) 12 ounce hammer, (1) ratcheting screwdriver, (4) hole saws with mandrel, (32) screwdriving bits, (1) magnetic bit holder, (10) drilling bits, (5) spade bits

specifications.Included Components: 68 Hand Tools And Accessories, 20V Lithium Drill, 1-Lithium Ion Battery, Carrying Bag
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,547 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
